channel.title: Free web designing
channel.description:
Well im no pro but im trying to fill up some time and get some more experience in web design, so i thought i would design some websites for you guys. If you want me to design you one please comment in this layout
[b]site name:[/b] [b]size:[/b] [b]colors:[/b]
If you do not really know how you want it please still state you want me to do you a site.

item.title: Free web designing
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

Well i was a plumbers apprentice then i quit so they offered me the job back helping them in there office, so far i have setup a system so they can use there pda’s and submit job quotes to the office, answer the phone, building them a website and creating an advert for them. Also made stickers for the vans and on taxi’s. Basically im saving them a bomb. What about you?

Read full topic

item.description:

lol i cant wait for my pay day either lol what do you do as a job ( off topic )

Read full topic

item.title: Free web designing
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

Yea il start working my way through them maybe on tue. And its ok i did not really look at it as you cussing me. Anyway 4 weeks staight 7:30am till 5-6pm, i will get getting a nice pay day for it

Read full topic

item.title: Free web designing
item.dc:creator: @g_man_i_live g man i live
item.description:

item.title: Free web designing
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

g man i live; nope i will look at them when i get time, at the moment i have been working from 7:30 till between 5-6pm when i get in im not in the mood to do any designing all i want to do is either go out with friends or watch tele. When i go back to school i will have a lot more time on my hands as i will not be working.

Read full topic

could you design me a wordpress template? do you have photoshop experience?

cane:

If you do not really know how you want it please still state you want me to do you a site.

if you need practice then just choose a scheme from colourlovers.com think of a layout etc and design your site… this is sort of pointless.

size: 1024x768
colours: black/silver/green
other: glossy
info: this website will be used for controlling the web server’s Serial port to program picaxe chips and display the result back via a webcam link.
